SELECT app_list.id, app_list.app_id, app_list.app_name, app_list.app_type FROM application_name_list LEFT JOIN app_list ON app_list.id = application_name_list.app_id LEFT JOIN name_list ON name_list.id = application_name_list.name_list_id WHERE name_list.list_name = #{0} AND ISNULL(application_name_list.delete_time)
